trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs object is automatically created and passed to the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 自動建立及傳遞至事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>事件</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs 物件的執行個體

trans-unit.source: An inherited class or event handler can use this event to show commands unique to the item, by changing the collection of commands in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別或事件處理常式可以使用這個事件來變更集合中的命令，顯示命令特有項目，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs> object, initializing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A> properties with the values of the `item` and `commands` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 建構新<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs>物件，初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A>屬性的值`item`和`commands`參數，分別。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of commands in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定集合中的命令<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，這個集合是空的。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: You can add or remove commands in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增或移除集合中的命令，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to access and modify the commands for a single item in an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object during the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來存取和修改中的單一項目的命令<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>物件期間<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: Changes made do not affect the base collection of commands specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object.
trans-unit.target: 所做的變更不會影響命令指定的基底集合<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: The collection of commands in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的命令<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list item for the specified commands that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的命令將顯示的清單項目。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The list item for the specified commands that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 指定將顯示的命令清單項目。
